column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm not a deep dish person
column2: but Lou's pizza is so good! The sausage they use is the best and they put a lot on their pies! What I loved though was how the crust came up the side of the pan and stayed nice and crispy on the edges. We didn't have any salad
column3: but their salads looked amazing and I can't wait to go back and try one.
